overview_of_class: Buckling of perfect and imperfect columns, mathematical treatment of various types of stability problems and stability criteria, dynamic and static instability and energy methods. Buckling of frames, trusses and beams. Snap-through, elastic-plastic columns, creep buckling and basic approach to buckling of two- and three-dimensional bodies.
name: Stability of Structures
title: MEAS CIV_ENV 424-0-1 Stability of Structures

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Buckling of perfect and imperfect columns, mathematical treatment of various types of stability problems and stability criteria, dynamic and static instability and energy methods. Buckling of frames, trusses and beams. Snap-through, elastic-plastic columns, creep buckling and basic approach to buckling of two- and three-dimensional bodies.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Available for purchase from Prof Bazant:
Bazant, Zdenek P. and Cedolin, Luigi. Stability of Structures: Elastic, Inelasatic, Fracture and Damage Theories. Dover Publications, 2003. ISBN 0486425681

subject: CIV_ENV
